text: Venantino Venantini (17 April 1930 - 8 October 2018) was an Italian movie actor. He has appeared in over 140 movies from 1954 until his retirement in 2016. He was born in Fabriano, Italy. Venantini was known for No Sun in Venice (1957), The Agony and the Ecstasy (1965), Le Grand Restaurant (1966), Erotissimo (1969), The Priest's Wife (1971), Seven Deaths in the Cat's Eye (1973), Black Emanuelle (1975), The Concorde Affair (1979), Cannibal Ferox (1981), and Le bon roi Dagobert (1984). Venantini died on 8 October 2018 in Viterbo, Italy from heart surgery complications at the age of 88.Ãˆ morto l'attore Venantino Venantini ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Italian movie actors
title: Venantino Venantini
